title: Trouble "Logging onto chat service..."
body:
Played the game just fine yesterday. Came back this evening and along the bottom of the client window it says "Logging onto chat service...". It never connects. Can't see online friends and they can't see me. 

Tried disabling the IP Helper as others suggested in past similar issues but it didn't help.

Any ideas guys?

Thank!

replies.body: Getting stuck trying to connect to chat could be due to an issue with your network.  As Rineyy suggested, please go over the [troubleshooting connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide for a series of instructions to get this fixed.  Let me know if you have any other issues afterwards, and we can dig deeper!

Likely due to an unstable connection with the servers. [Troubleshoot your connectivity issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)
